info.author: Tetrad Implemented by DataShop@CMU datashop-help@lists.andrew.cmu.edu
info.abstract:
The simulation component will simulate data based on the input graph. If you would like to create a continuous dataset, select a SEM or Standardized SEM (Structural Equation Model). For discrete data, select Bayes.
Model parameters are set randomly.
Tetrad Website
info.inputs: tetrad-graph - likely generated by a Search or Tetrad Graph Editor component.
info.outputs:
tab-delimited - Simulated data set.
tab-delimited - Model parameters used to generate this dataset.
info.options:
Model - Type of model used to generate data. SEM for continous, Bayes for discrete.
Sample Size - Number of rows in the generated dataset.
